Text: RE TFS Inc Cc I have now reviewed the documents and discussed them with my client It is now proposed that the Broker be Tradition Financial Services Limited of Middlesex Street London E JF England The necessary changes should be made to the documents to reflect thisIn the first full paragraph on the second page of the Fee Agreement in the second line annual should be deleted and at the annual rate of should be inserted after fee In addition in the same lineNorth American Gas should be deleted and there should be substituted the products specified in Exhibit A attached hereto and made a part hereof I look forward to hearing from you that the above is agreed Kind regards Geoffrey Original Message From Greenberg Mark mailtoMark NRONcom Sent Tuesday October PM To Cc Diamond Daniel Panus Stephanie Jones Tana Subject TFS Inc AlanGeoffrey Below you will find a BETA and Fee Agreement for TFS Inc in relation to certain European products These agreements reflect that TFS Inc be the Broker and thus need to be signed by the appropriate officer of TFS Inc Once they have been signed and the accurate address for TFS Inc completed in the BETA they should be returned to my attention for countersignature by Enron Please let me know if either of you should have any questions or need anything further with regard to this matter Mark TFSLondon Branch betadoc TFSLondon Branch Fee Agmtdoc This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
